version_description: Your all-time favorite coin pusher now loads EVEN QUICKER! Direct a deluge of coins with even greater precision, speed and hopefully, success! Need a bit more with your updates? Check out our NEWEST PUZZLE, featuring chart-topper 4 PICS 1 SONG! Can YOU solve for the song? All this, PLUS BUG FIXES!

COME ONE, COME ALL, to COIN DOZER! The game you know and love, updated! We've swept the bugs into the gutters so you have a clear path to COINS! Collect your prizes and puzzles without fear, ladies and gents! Don't forget about our NEWEST PUZZLE, featuring chart-topper 4 PICS 1 SONG! You all ready to get your carnival on?

Thanks for downloading us
onto your phone,
we hope that this poem
won’t make you groan!
We’re excited about this new update, you see!
Our BRAND NEW PUZZLE is sure to bring glee!
Can you collect all the pieces?
It’s a worthy quest!
Particularly during your post-turkey rest!
We’ve squashed some bugs
like we usually do,
to bring our best games directly to you!
So good luck with the puzzle,
we hope that it’s fun,
and that you think Coin Dozer
is second to none! 

And, check out the new Bonus Item!

Fans- it’s that time again! The latest update for Coin Dozer is at hand, now with a BRAND NEW prizeline: Watches!
Collect these terrific timepieces to unlock the new SILVER BURST special coin - it’s sure to get you "tock"ing!
When you collect a Silver Burst coin, a "burst" of Silver coins will appear!
Also, Bonus XP special coins are now worth more at higher levels!
It's definitely an update to get wound up about! So DOWNLOAD now and look out for those Watches: time flies when you're having fun!

Huge update!

- New GRAVITRON ride puzzle pieces!
- You can now drop up to 6 coins at once!
- Bonus items will now offer to help you if a prize gets too close to the edge!

COME ONE, COME ALL, to COIN DOZER! The game you know and love, updated! We've swept the bugs into the gutters so you have a clear path to COINS! The load times are even faster, so you can tap, tap, tap away! Collect your prizes and puzzles without fear, ladies and gents! You all ready to get your carnival on?

- Brand new Puzzle featuring Prize Claw 2!
- Various visual enhancements and game improvements!
- Numerous bug fixes!

- Various visual enhancements and game improvements!
- Numerous bug fixes!
- Bug Fixes!

- NEW: Look out for a Mystery Box to appear on the board! Collect it for your chance to win Dozer Dollars, Coins, Special Coins, Prizes, or Puzzle Pieces!
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- Puzzle Mastery! Completed all the puzzles? You can now re-complete them and earn more rewards!

- New prizelines! Elephants and Duckies!
- Fixed an issue for the puzzle mastery feature.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

- New Balloon Pop minigame! Collect the new balloon coin for a chance to win rare prizes!
- Added support for upcoming July 4th seasonal event! Reach level 7 to participate the week of the holiday.
- New Dart prizeline!
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug Fixes and Improvements!
